name: OCKInsightQuery
desc: A query that limits which events the store returns, when it is computing insights.

items.name: init(taskID: String, dateInterval: DateInterval, aggregator: OCKEventAggregator)
items.desc: Creates a new query with a specific task identifier, date interval, and aggregator.

items.name: var aggregator: OCKEventAggregator
items.desc: An aggregator that derives an insight from a series of events.

items.name: var dateInterval: DateInterval
items.desc: A date interval for entities that match the query.

items.name: var taskID: String
items.desc: The task identifiers for entities that match the query.
